Description: Worked flint blade, rectangular in shape, segmented blade, truncated at proximal and distal ends, abrupt retouch along both dorsal laterals. Beige patina on ventral side. Dark red coloured stone with cream coloured bands, fine-grained with patina.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, surface (X)
